name: Oshadham Wellness
description: Oshadham Wellness is committed to providing authentic, high-quality Ayurvedic products formulated based on classical texts and validated by modern research. Our focus is on clinical efficacy and practitioner trust.

testimonials.author: Dr. V. K. Sharma
testimonials.quote: Oshadham's products have shown consistent results in my clinical practice. Their commitment to quality is commendable.

name: Kalpatantra Ayurveda
description: Kalpatantra Ayurveda blends traditional manufacturing processes with rigorous scientific validation, including clinical trials for its key formulations, ensuring both safety and efficacy.

name: Atharva Ayurveda
description: Atharva Ayurveda specializes in sourcing and preparing rare and complex classical formulations, making them accessible to practitioners for treating challenging health conditions.

name: Himalaya Wellness
description: A global leader in herbal healthcare, Himalaya Wellness combines the best of Ayurveda with modern scientific research to develop a wide range of products for holistic well-being.
